root: ^Flork: Oh boy, fried ice cubes. My favorite.
^You (Streamer): Wait, aren’t you supposed to, uh…
^You (Streamer): NOT put ice cubes in the deep fryer?
^Flork: Well, it didn’t turn out too bad last time!

whahappen: ^Flork: Luckily, I only ended up with second-degree burns.
^Flork: Yeah. Heals up in no time.
^You (Streamer): I shudder to think what happens to you on the regular for you to see that as “no time”.
lasttime: ^Flork: Oh, I do this every Thanksgiving.
^Flork: Kind of like how people do deep fried turkey.
^You (Streamer): …I don’t suppose those turn out too well either.
^Flork: Oh, no, definitely not. When my uncle made it it was still raw on the inside!
^Flork: Shame we couldn’t be too harsh on him for it. He ended up in the hospital.
interlude: ^Flork: Well, I must be off. I hear my frying oil boiling.
